trans-unit.source: Represents controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.
trans-unit.target: Representa controlos que expõem as respetivas propriedades de ancoragem dentro de um contentor de ancoragem.

trans-unit.source: A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: Um contentor de ancoragem é um controlo que permite a disposição dos subordinados elementos horizontal e verticalmente, relativo à limites do contentor de ancoragem e outros elementos no contentor.

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement, the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container.
trans-unit.target: Controlos são ancorados relativamente à entre si com base na respetiva ordem de z atual; a maior respetiva ordem z colocação, o mais são instaladas do limite do contentor ancoragem especificado.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [controlo padrão de mapeamento para os clientes de automatização de IU](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter exemplos de controlos que podem implementar este padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: DockPattern does not support any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that might be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container.
trans-unit.target: DockPattern não suporta quaisquer propriedades do contentor ancoragem ou quaisquer propriedades de controlos que poderão ser ancorados adjacentes para o controlo atual dentro do contentor de ancoragem.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache devem ter sido anteriormente pedidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade pedida não está na cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este padrão tem de ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contém apenas os dados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor em cache de uma propriedade que foi anteriormente especificado utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation.DockPosition*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation.DockPosition*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation.DockPosition*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade também pode ser obtida a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern"> </xref> padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] é transmitido para métodos de como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>obter o padrão de controlo de interesse do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Docks the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref> at the requested <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition"></xref> within a docking container.
trans-unit.target: Docks o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref> no pedido <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition"> </xref> dentro de um contentor de ancoragem.

trans-unit.source: A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: Um contentor de ancoragem é um controlo que permite a disposição dos subordinados elementos horizontal e verticalmente, relativo à limites do contentor de ancoragem e outros elementos no contentor.

trans-unit.source: The dock position relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: A posição de ancoragem relativo os limites do contentor de ancoragem e outros elementos no contentor.

trans-unit.source: When a control is not able to execute the requested dock style.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controlo não é possível executar o estilo de ancoragem pedida.
